title: CodeSwarm - GPU Telemetry
description: Visualization-first GPU telemetry sourced from host nvidia-smi CSV via Alloy -> Loki (log_source=gpu_telemetry). Panels cover utilization, VRAM, temperature, power, and process usage.

panels.title: GPU utilization % (current)
panels.description: Current GPU utilization as a single KPI. Ideal for spotting burst/load saturation during model benchmarks.

panels.title: VRAM usage % (current)
panels.description: Current VRAM usage percent from live GPU telemetry.

panels.title: GPU temperature (F, current)
panels.description: Current GPU temperature in Fahrenheit.

panels.title: GPU power draw (W, current)
panels.description: Current GPU power draw in watts.

panels.title: GPU utilization % (trend)
panels.description: Smoothed utilization trend over 1 minute windows.

panels.title: VRAM usage % (trend)
panels.description: Smoothed VRAM usage trend over 1 minute windows.

panels.title: GPU temperature (F, trend)
panels.description: Smoothed GPU temperature trend in Fahrenheit.

panels.title: GPU power draw (W, trend)
panels.description: Smoothed GPU power draw trend.

panels.title: VRAM free (GB, current)
panels.description: Current free VRAM in GB (from MiB telemetry converted to GB).

targets.expr: ((last_over_time(({log_source="gpu_telemetry",filename=~".*gpu-live.*csv",host=~"$host"} |~ "$gpu_match" | pattern "<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<mem_total>,<_>,<_>" | unwrap mem_total | __error__="")[30m]) - last_over_time(({log_source="gpu_telemetry",filename=~".*gpu-live.*csv",host=~"$host"} |~ "$gpu_match" | pattern "<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<mem_used>,<_>,<_>,<_>" | unwrap mem_used | __error__="")[30m])) / 1024)

panels.title: Thermal headroom (F)
panels.description: Remaining thermal headroom against 185F target; low values suggest thermal throttling risk.

panels.title: Perf proxy per watt
panels.description: Telemetry value per watt (proxy) for efficiency tracking across benchmark runs.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(({log_source="telemetry"} |~ "$run_id" |~ "$model_name" | json | unwrap value | __error__="")[30m])) / sum(avg_over_time(({log_source="gpu_telemetry",filename=~".*gpu-live.*csv",host=~"$host"} |~ "$gpu_match" | pattern "<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<power_w>" | unwrap power_w | __error__="")[30m]))

panels.title: Throttling risk events
panels.description: Counts high-temperature/high-power risk events in last 5 minutes.

panels.title: GPU utilization percentile band (P50/P95)
panels.description: Percentile utilization band to distinguish sustained load (P50) from bursts (P95).

panels.title: GPU temperature percentile band (F P50/P95)
panels.description: Percentile temperature band to identify thermal drift and spike behavior under load.

panels.title: Host CPU non-idle %
panels.description: Host CPU non-idle percentage. Correlate high CPU contention with GPU underutilization.

panels.title: Host iowait %
panels.description: Host I/O wait percentage. Rising iowait can stall model pipelines even with available GPU headroom.

panels.title: Host memory used %
panels.description: Host memory pressure percentage. Correlate RAM pressure with benchmark instability.

panels.title: Top GPU processes by memory (MiB, current)
panels.description: Top GPU processes by memory footprint. Use to identify dominant benchmark workers.

targets.expr: topk(8, sum by (proc_name) (max_over_time(({log_source="gpu_telemetry",filename=~".*gpu-proc.*csv",host=~"$host"} |~ "$gpu_match" | pattern "<_>,<_>,<proc_name>,<mem_mib>" | unwrap mem_mib | __error__="")[30m])))

panels.title: Benchmark markers/events
panels.description: Benchmark context events filtered by run/model text variables. Useful for mapping workload phases to GPU behavior.

panels.title: Source Context
panels.description: Active scope and variable filters for this dashboard.

options.content:
### Source Context
- Host filter: `${host:text}`
- GPU name regex filter: `${gpu_match}`
- Benchmark run filter: `${run_id}`
- Benchmark model filter: `${model_name}`
- Log type filter for drill panels: `${log_type:text}`
- Note: benchmark filters are text/regex matchers over benchmark event logs.

panels.title: GPU fault signals
panels.description: Count of GPU fault-like signals (Xid, CUDA errors, OOM, thermal/power warnings) in the last 5 minutes.

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({log_source=~"rsyslog_syslog|gpu_telemetry"} |~ "(?i)(NVRM|Xid|CUDA error|out of memory|OOM|GPU has fallen off the bus|throttl|overheat|power limit)" [30m]))

panels.title: GPU telemetry samples
panels.description: Total GPU telemetry sample lines ingested in the last 5 minutes.

panels.title: Logs by volume
panels.description: GPU signal volume over time: live samples, process samples, benchmark events, and fault events.

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({log_source=~"rsyslog_syslog|gpu_telemetry"} |~ "(?i)(NVRM|Xid|CUDA error|out of memory|OOM|GPU has fallen off the bus|throttl|overheat|power limit|failed|error|panic)" [30m]))

panels.title: GPU telemetry drill
panels.description: Raw GPU telemetry logs for deep drill-down. Uses host and GPU regex filters.

panels.title: GPU incident stream
panels.description: Focused incident stream for GPU and system fault conditions.

targets.expr: {log_source=~"rsyslog_syslog|gpu_telemetry"} |~ "(?i)(NVRM|Xid|CUDA error|out of memory|OOM|GPU has fallen off the bus|throttl|overheat|power limit|failed|error|panic)"

panels.title: Loaded model (detected from vLLM logs)
panels.description: Detected served model name from startup logs. This panel searches last 7 days to keep model context visible on short dashboard ranges.

panels.title: Benchmark phase/event timeline
panels.description: Timeline of benchmark and model lifecycle events filtered by run/model text.

panels.title: Utilization percentile band (P50/P95/P99)
panels.description: Percentile utilization band to compare baseline, sustained pressure, and burst peaks.

panels.title: Temperature percentile band (F P50/P95/P99)
panels.description: Temperature percentile band in Fahrenheit for thermal envelope analysis.

panels.title: Power percentile band (W P50/P95/P99)
panels.description: Power draw percentile band in watts for burst and sustained draw comparison.

panels.title: Utilization by GPU name (current)
panels.description: Current utilization split by GPU name for multi-GPU readiness.

panels.title: Temperature by GPU name (current F)
panels.description: Current temperature by GPU name in Fahrenheit.

panels.title: Power by GPU name (current W)
panels.description: Current power draw by GPU name in watts.

panels.title: Efficiency proxy trend (value per watt)
panels.description: Smoothed efficiency proxy trend: telemetry value divided by GPU power.

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(({log_source="telemetry"} |~ "$run_id" |~ "$model_name" | json | unwrap value | __error__="")[30m])) / sum(avg_over_time(({log_source="gpu_telemetry",filename=~".*gpu-live.*csv",host=~"$host"} |~ "$gpu_match" | pattern "<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<power_w>" | unwrap power_w | __error__="")[30m]))

panels.title: Efficiency proxy current (value per watt)
panels.description: Current efficiency proxy snapshot.

targets.expr: sum(last_over_time(({log_source="telemetry"} |~ "$run_id" |~ "$model_name" | json | unwrap value | __error__="")[30m])) / sum(last_over_time(({log_source="gpu_telemetry",filename=~".*gpu-live.*csv",host=~"$host"} |~ "$gpu_match" | pattern "<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<_>,<power_w>" | unwrap power_w | __error__="")[30m]))

panels.title: Operator quick actions
panels.description: Operational shortcuts and interpretation notes.

options.content:
### Operator quick actions
- Open panel menu -> **Explore** to drill into raw lines for any spike.
- Use `run_id` and `model_name` filters to isolate one benchmark run.
- Compare **Util P95/P99** and **Temp/Power P95/P99** to detect thermal or power-capped behavior.
- Use **GPU incident stream** for Xid/OOM/fault triage.

target.expr: {log_source=~"rsyslog_syslog|gpu_telemetry"} |~ "(?i)(NVRM|Xid|CUDA error|out of memory|OOM|GPU has fallen off the bus)"
